title: vivo V21e (Sunset Jazz, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Earphone, USB Power Adapter, Type C USB Cable, SIM Ejector, Protective Case, Protective Film (Applied), Documentation
product_specification.Other Display Features: 20:09 Aspect Ratio, 90.1% Screen-to-Body Ratio, Schott Xensation UP Screen Protection
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Dual Rear Camera Setup: 64MP Main (f/1.79 Aperture) + 8MP Ultra Wide-Angle Camera (f/2.2 Aperture), Camera Features: Photo, Portait, Night, 64 MP, Pano, Live Photo, Slo-mo, Time-lapse, Pro, AR Stickers, Doc, Double Exposure
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 32MP Front Camera (f/2.0 Aperture), Camera Features: Photo, Portait, Night, Live Photo, AR stickers, Double Exposure
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E-Compass, Fingerprint Sensor (In-Display), Gyroscope (Entity)
product_specification.Audio Formats: WAV, MP3, MP2, MIDI, Vorbis, APE, FLAC, ACC
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year for Handset and 6 Months for In-box Accessories

product_description.Trendy, Slim Design: The Vivo V21e is a trendy and slim smartphone that is 7.67 mm thin and weighs about 165 g. Thus, it is comfortable to hold and carry along.
product_description.32 MP Super Night Selfie: The 32 MP front camera of this smartphone, along with sufficient light, lets you capture photos with rich details and vibrant shades. Also, its Super Night Selfie feature, multi-frame optimisation, and multi-level exposure help capture the stunning details in night shots.
product_description.44 W FlashCharge: This smartphone comes with a 4000 mAh battery with 44 W FlashCharge that boosts the battery life for up to 72% in about 30 minutes of charging.
product_description.Extended RAM: The Vivo V21e comes with an extended RAM technology to offer you an impressive 8 GB + 3 GB experience with the help of 3 GB of external memory space. So, you can access up to 20 apps simultaneously without lag.
product_description.64 MP Night Camera: This smartphone comes with a 64 MP night camera that lets you capture the marvellous beauty of the world clearly even in low-light conditions.
product_description.8 MP Ultra Wide-angle Camera: The 8 MP Ultra Wide-angle camera of this smartphone features a 120° coverage. So, you can capture a wide area with every click.
product_description.Ultra-fast 5G Dual SIM Dual Standby: This smartphone is powered by a 7nm MediaTek Dimensity 700 processor for smooth operation and the Ultra-Fast 5G Dual SIM Dual Standby setup for high-speed internet access. Also, the MediaTek 5G UltraSave ensures low power consumption for a long and smooth performance.
product_description.Double Exposure: This feature offers three styles and templates in both the back and front cameras. So, you can experiment with creativity.
product_description.Dual-view Video: You can roll the front and the back cameras at the same time to capture everything around you. So, you can capture both sides and/or perspectives of any story.
product_description.FHD+ AMOLED Display: This smartphone comes with a 16.35 cm(6.44) FHD+ AMOLED display featuring an 2400 x 1080 ultra-high resolution. As a result, you can watch gorgeous visuals with true-to-life colours.
product_description.Funtouch OS 11.1: This Vivo V21e smartphone runs on the Funtouch OS 11.1 (based on Android 11) that features a user-friendly, minimalist aesthetic.

I am very happy after purchase of Vivo V21e 5g. Its slimmest & very light weight. Camera is better in night mode. Super amoled display is better & battery back is also good. There is the need for stereo speakers & some updation is also required for camera. If you want the pic of 64 megapixel, you need to choose 64 megapixel. It may not the basic camera of 64 megapixel.

pros.Design: This phone has a slim and trendy design. It is lightweight and very comfortable to use.
pros.4000 mAh Battery: The 4000 mAh battery along with 44W fast charger is perfect to make the phone last long.
pros.Camera: The dual rear camera setup and 32MP front camera setup captures decent pics and is good in this price range.

cons.Performance: The octa core MediaTek Dimensity 700 is a bit slow and there are lagging issues with this phone.

summary.verdict: The vivo V21evivo V21e is a good choice with decent features in this price segment.
summary.Additional Information: In display fingerprint, Dual 5g sim support, Water and fire resistant.
